package.name: reis_resources

description.p: Shared configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Reis manipulators.

This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files that are shared between different Reis robot support packages within the ROS Industrial program.
This package also contains common urdf and xacro resources used by other Reis related packages.

package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
